title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: NPS Centennial
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     NPS Centennial             Get Involved         Capulin Volcano in winter NPS photo  Looking for ways to get involved? Browse these pages to find opportunities:   NPS Centennial  The National Park Service is celebrating its centennial in 2016. Find out how we're celebrating our 100th anniversary and how you can join the celebration.    Partners  We can't do it alone. Our nonprofit partner plays an important role in the success of Capulin Volcano National Monument.    Donate  Find out how you can make a financial donation to Capulin Volcano.    Volunteer  Volunteers serve Capulin Volcano National Monument in a variety of ways. Learn how you can help.    Work With Us  Look for employment opportunities at Capulin Volcano.    Do Business With Us  Gatherings and commercial activities in Capulin Volcano NM may require a special use permit. Find out whether your event requires a permit.    Planning  Capulin Volcano's management documents guide park decisions, resource protection, and activity programming.
